backend/main.mo: Defines data models for salons, bookings, users, and images, initializes storage and access control, and seeds default Swiss salons if none exist.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two frontend overwrite features targeting AppV1.jsx with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to concise summaries describing their UI roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables with light/dark OKLCH color definitions and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper component that renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React UI implementing the DIVINE OS V14 interface with salons, stories rail, holographic cards, and booking interactions.

frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file for salon image management hook.

frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility file intended for currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters including hash‑based routing support.
